classes.title: Junior Financial Analyst
classes.background:
This course is designed to teach students, who have passion in financial industry, the basic knowledge of finance and different job functionalities. 
學員將會被安排面對面與不同金融專業人任接觸和交談。課程將介紹現時金融界的基本概念，能讓學員認識到市場、銀行、證券公司和交易所；資本轉移，各類證券以及投資決策過程的知識。此外，課程內容亦會介紹投資決策於股票上所用的工具，以及基本會計概念和Execl的使用方法，從而令學員學習到基礎分析、技術分析和流程分析的技巧。課程概念將透過案例研究和使用本地市場例子作解說。
classes.topics:
This 2 -week course will cover: 
Introduction of financial market; Investment Bank vs Commercial Bank 
The need for Capital market; Introduction of types of securities 
How to Analyze a Company? 
Basic Accounting 
Introduction to Excel Modeling 
Introduction of different job types in financial market and MEET the Professionals 
HK Exchange & Clearing Visit
classes.about:
Mr. So 為量智學院有限公司的其中一位創辦人。學院致力於為青少年提供財務和技術技能，為新時代的挑戰和機遇做好準備。學院主要著重於非傳統的教育，不能從常規高中教育中吸取的知識。Mr. So 亦於 HKU SPACE 任教多年，主要教授金融課程，有多年教育經驗. 
 Mr. So was working in the financial industry for over 18 years at various reputable Investment Banks such as Goldman Sachs, Merrill Lynch, Nomura, ING Bank and Deutsche Bank.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
